# Government Tender Announcement

## Standing Offer for Land, Topographic, and Bathymetric Survey Services

### Overview

A standing offer is being issued for land, topographic, and bathymetric survey services to support various projects within Alberta and Saskatchewan. This offer is intended to provide Defence Construction Canada (DCC) with consultant expertise on an "as and when required" basis.

### Objective

This is not a bid solicitation. Instead, it serves as an advance notice of a potential standing offer with anticipated security requirements. Interested consultants can begin the sponsorship request process to obtain the required security clearance(s).

### Services

The following services may be provided:

* Land Surveys
* Topographical and Bathymetric Surveying
* Geographical Information Surveys (GIS)
* Boundary and Fence Line Perambulation Surveys
* Legal Surveys
* Reference Plans

### Estimated Costs

The estimated cost for these services is approximately $900,000 over three years, with the potential for additional options and increased value.

### Security Requirements

Consultants will be required to hold the Designated Organization Screening (DOS) clearance at the time of contract award. Defence Construction Canada is providing consultants with early access to the security clearance application process through its Industrial Security Program (ISP).

### Sponsorship Process

Consultants interested in participating in the standing offer should begin the security clearance application process by submitting a sponsorship request application to DCC. Once the sponsorship request package is complete, DCC will forward it to the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) for processing.

### Disclaimer

DCC does not provide any assurances or guarantees that a sponsorship request package or a security clearance application will be successful or result in the granting of the required security clearance(s). Consultants must bear any risks associated with the completeness or accuracy of their application and the timeliness of the security clearance granting process.

### Bidding Documents

Bidding documents and more information are available on the Merx website: http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
